cctair

Class Flight

  • java.lang.Object
    • cctair.Flight

  • public class Flight
extends java.lang.Object
    A Flight object holds all the information belonging to a flight.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Flight(java.lang.String origin, java.lang.String destination, java.time.LocalTime departureTime, java.time.LocalTime arrivalTime, java.time.LocalDate flightDate, Aircraft assignedAircraft)
      Constructor for the Flight class that receives the origin of the flight, its destination, departure time, arrival time, date and assigned aircraft.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void schedule(java.time.LocalTime arrivalTime)
      Setter for the arrival time of the flight.
      void schedule(java.time.LocalTime departureTime, java.time.LocalTime arrivalTime)
      Setter for the arrival and departure times of the flight.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Flight information printer.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Flight

        public Flight(java.lang.String origin,
              java.lang.String destination,
              java.time.LocalTime departureTime,
              java.time.LocalTime arrivalTime,
              java.time.LocalDate flightDate,
              Aircraft assignedAircraft)
        Constructor for the Flight class that receives the origin of the flight, its destination, departure time, arrival time, date and assigned aircraft.
        Parameters:
        origin - holds a String with the city of departure.
        destination - holds a String with the city of arrival.
        departureTime - holds the departure time for the flight.
        arrivalTime - holds the arrival time for the flight.
        flightDate - holds the date of the flight.
        assignedAircraft - holds an object of type Aircraft which is assigned to the flight.

    • Method Detail

      • schedule

        public void schedule(java.time.LocalTime arrivalTime)
        Setter for the arrival time of the flight.
        Parameters:
        arrivalTime - is received from the method call and then assigned to the instance of the class Flight.

      • schedule

        public void schedule(java.time.LocalTime departureTime,
                     java.time.LocalTime arrivalTime)
        Setter for the arrival and departure times of the flight.
        Parameters:
        arrivalTime - is received from the method call and then assigned to the instance of the class Flight.
        departureTime - is received from the method call and then assigned to the instance of the class Flight.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Flight information printer.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a String with the flight date, its origin, destination, departure time, arrival time, aircraft type, its make (or brand), its model, its capacity and the assigned pilot's name.
